column4: If I want to update from 10.04 to 11.10, can I just run install manager with the -d flag?
I dunno if jumping releases for upgrade is supported...it is between LTSes, but I dunno about from 10.04 to 11.10 directly
my experience with upgrading ubuntu has never been good anyway...the ubuntu upgrade path isn't all that smooth sometimes...it's often easier to reinstall
